ModMetaData.name: Tusken Gear Mod (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Worthless Wretch and Luwenstein
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/buuPQel.png[/img] Update of Worthless Wretch and Luwensteins mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1285905055
[img]https://i.imgur.com/pufA0kM.png[/img]
[table] [tr] [td][url=https://dsc.gg/mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/TuskenGearMod][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [tr] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/WjDSfUn.png[/img][/td] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/Be8E2qJ.png[/img][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img] Tusken Gear Mod
A mod which adds tusken raider apparel and weapons.
All Star Wars™ references are made in pure love for the franchise and not in pursuit of profit
- All items are crafted at machining table. - Rifle got a huge (really huge) range, mediocre damage and very long windup. - Armor and headgear are supposed to be worn in hot climates as they provide high temperature resistance. - Female headgear can be worn by male colonists.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/PwoNOj4.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] or the standalone [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2873415404]Uploader[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [*] Use [url=https://github.com/RimSort/RimSort/releases/latest]RimSort[/url] to sort your mods [/list]
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/changelog/2293185932][img]https://img.shields.io/github/v/release/emipa606/TuskenGearMod?label=latest%20version&style=plastic&color=9f1111&labelColor=black[/img][/url] | tags: star wars, hot climate
